column1: # Title: Mapping from IEA countries or composite regions to country ISO codes.

# Description: IEA_ctry refers to the name of the country or country group in the IEA Energy Balances. IEA_Fert_reg corresponds to the world region for which ammonia production volumes and energy intensities are reported in Table 4.15 of IEA (2007); Tracking Industrial Energy Efficiency and CO2 Emissions
